item.description:
Heat up the dance floor with us this July!

Come dance with us July 12th!
2nd Saturday of the month!

Come for the free lesson @ 8 and stay for the dancing!


3 hours of DANCING starting at 9pm!

Party for ONLY $8! Student Discount: $5!
FREE Lesson!


Cash Bar...Plenty of FREE Parking...Warm, Family Vibe!
All Ages Welcome!


THIS NIGHT IS CREATED BY DANCERS, FOR DANCERS!
OUR LOVE OF SALSA IS THE SHEER MOTIVATION FOR THIS NIGHT.
IT IS THE PERFECT PLACE FOR THAT SALSA FIX!


Location:
Knights of Columbus
75 West School St.
Charlestown, MA 02129

For More Info:
http://www.masacoteen...
item.why: Great dj! Great music! Great dancers! Great people! What more can you ask for?

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Masacote's Beantown Salsa Jam!
